awd_titl_txt: Group Travel for U.S. Participants in the Second Scientific Assembly of the International Association of Hydrological   Sciences in Budapest, Hungary, July 2-10, 1986
awd_abstract_narration: A team of U.S. scientists will attend the Second Scientific Assembly of         the International Association of Hydrological Sciences in Budapest,             Hungary, July 2-10, l986.  The American Geophysical Union (AGU) will be         responsible for the administration of the travel grant and will                 constitute a committee of scientists that will screen the requests for          travel support and make recommendations for funding.  During the                meeting the assembly will discuss the engineering issues related to:            snow melt  - induced processes and forecasting; changes in water                quality and presence of pollutant in snow and snow melt waters; and             surface water - groundwater quantitative and qualitative interactions.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
